abstract: United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki-moon meets with delegation of officials from Saudi Arabia, led by deputy crown prince Mohammed bin Salman, over inclusion of country in list of armies accused of killing and maiming children in Yemen in 2015 during conflict there; Saudi Arabia was removed from list after it threatened to cut off funding for humanitarian programs.

headline.print_headline: Saudis Air Grievances With U.N. Over a List
headline.main: Saudis Question U.N. Leader Over Report on Rights Violators

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The United Nations secretary general had initially listed the Saudi-led coalition in Yemen among the armies accused of killing children in 2015, before taking it off.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations secretary general had initially listed the Saudi-led coalition in Yemen among the armies accused of killing children in 2015, before taking it off.
